who-am-i.title: So, <0>about me</0>
who-am-i.content-1: I am Javier Segovia. A developer of {{age}} years old based in Venezuela.
who-am-i.content-2: Back in 2016, I started my career as a developer without even realizing it. I tried to build a web page with basic HTML, CSS and Javascript just as a hobby. I found out that programming was actually fun. So I kept learning, practicing, and hacking things.
who-am-i.content-3: Since then, Iâ€™ve had diverse experiences in the development world: from working with multiple clients as an indie freelancer, to be part of a whole team of amazing developers following an agile methodology.
who-am-i.content-4: Today, these are some of the tools that I have experience with:

works.title: HoyTrabajas
works.shortDescription: Recruitment platform for matching candidates and job offers
description: I worked as a full-stack developer in multiple functionalities of the platform, including the layout, user interface and experience, the management of the database and the implementation of services.
works.techUsed: HAML, SASS, JavaScript, React, Ruby on Rails, RSpec, Docker, Elasticsearch, PostgreSQL

works.title: GoShop
works.shortDescription: Ecommerce platform for creating quickly online stores
description: I worked as a freelancer in the implementation of themes for the platform's individual stores, making visual and technical adjustments regarding the particular functionalities of each theme in question.
works.techUsed: HAML, SASS, Ruby on Rails, RSpec, PostgreSQL

works.title: Slatam
works.shortDescription: A work-in-progress marketplace platform for B2B
description: Slatam is a project in development that has helped me to test how different tools of the JavaScript ecosystem can work together. I work on it in my free time and, in the future, the goal is that it becomes a platform for global trade oriented to B2B.
works.techUsed: HTML, TypeScript, React, NextJS, Styled Components, Tailwind, GraphQL, NestJS, NodeJS, PostgreSQL, Docker

works.title: JobCirc
works.shortDescription: Tools to automatically manage your commercial job board postings
description: One of the first projects in which I participated as a freelancer. My contribution was oriented to the visual part, although I was also involved in some functionalities of the backend made in Wordpress.
